Psalms__127.1: Blessed are all they that fear the Lord: that walk in his ways.
Psalms__127.2: For thou shalt eat the labours of thy hands: blessed art thou, and it shall be well with thee.
Psalms__127.3: Thy wife as a fruitful vine, on the sides of thy house. Thy children as olive plants, round about thy table.
Psalms__127.4: Behold, thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the Lord.
Psalms__127.5: May the Lord bless thee out of Sion: and mayest thou see the good things of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
Psalms__127.6: And mayest thou see thy children's children, peace upon Israel.
